new_filings.description: CEO transition formalization (Warren Buffett to Greg Abel)
new_filings.significance: Administrative filing, no new material information

news_events.headline: Buffett still hunting for 'elephant' deals in final days as CEO
news_events.summary: Never-before-seen interview reveals Buffett willing to spend $100B but 'I don't see anything' at current prices. Cash hoard is forced inaction, not strategy.
news_events.significance: High - shifts narrative on cash position

news_events.headline: Greg Abel earns $25M salary (250x Buffett's $100K)
news_events.summary: Abel's compensation significantly higher than Buffett's symbolic $100K salary. Reasonable for $1.06T company but creates optics contrast.
news_events.significance: Medium - potential narrative point if underperformance continues

news_events.headline: BNSF Railway reports safest year ever in 177-year history
news_events.summary: Employee injury frequency down 10%, rail equipment incidents down 13%. Demonstrates operational excellence.
news_events.significance: Medium - positive operating signal, but no revenue/volume data

key_takeaways: BRK.B underperformance persists: -1.08% weekly, -0.72% YTD, lagging S&P 500 by -1.96pp
Buffett interview reveals cash hoard is 'forced inaction' at current valuations, not strategic preference
Top holdings mixed: Energy/consumer strength (CVX +2.41%) vs. financials weakness (BAC -4.02%)
S&P 500 at 6,940 - still 31% above Level 1 deployment trigger (4,720)
BNSF operational excellence continues (safest year ever), but financial performance data awaited
No SEC filings of material significance this week; next major filing is Q4 13F (due Feb 14)
week_over_week_changes: BRK.B weekly performance: -1.08% (vs S&P 500 performance: +0.22% estimated)
Underperformance gap widened slightly from -1.14pp (W03) to -1.96pp (W04)
Financials showing weakness: BAC -4.02% (largest decline in top holdings)
Energy continuing strength from previous weeks: CVX +2.41%
No new capital deployment announcements (OxyChem and BHE transmission from previous weeks)
